Page 97 F Item: N2070 Beautiful Necklace, retail was $159.00 plus tax and shipping. Catalog description: "Flash your baby blues in this chunky Quartzite and Necklace with a Sterling Silver-wrapped, etched Pendant. Approximately 18" with a 2" Extender." ***Happy shopping as you live abundantly, laugh often and love much. :-) ***Be sure to check out my other great items! *** I am not affiliated with Silpada, therefore no company guarantee applies. ***I want you to be completely happy with your decision to buy. Please email me with any questions * PayPal only please. I provide delivery confirmation. Shipping: I will combine shipping on multiple purchases whenever possible. *I make it a practice to reuse and recycle shipping materials whenever I can…not only for financial reasons, but for ecological reasons. Paypal payments made on Holidays will be mailed the next business day. I send an email stating that the item has been shipped. Paypal Payments will go to the address on the paypal account unless you notify me. Refunds: Please ask questions, check measurements and read item descriptions very carefully.
